name: Dig Dog Dig
description:
Help a lovely dog find his bone which he buried somewhere deep underground. Watch out for obstacles and junk that could hurt him!

Credits:

All artwork and programming by me, Sergi.

Dialog box font: The FontStruction “Pixelated”
(http://fontstruct.com/fontstructions/show/426637) by “Greenma201” is
licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike license
(http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/).
